name: SimpleIPChanger
short_description:
Tired of switching constantly between static & DHCP IPs, between office and home? Look no further. This very simple to use script will work flawlessly.

Just set the paramters once & relax. There are many other such files with fancy GUI and configuration, but they don't work on my machines, esp. Windows 8 & I don't trust executables.

Run this simple script, with peace of mind. WYSIWG
summary: Simple batch file to change your IP. Supports both Static & DHCP IP
